recommendations.title: Migrate to Free Tier for RDS
recommendations.description: RDS has a free tier for development and testing. Migrate the database to the free tier to save costs.
steps: Stop the RDS instance
Delete the RDS instance
Create a new RDS instance with the free tier
Reconfigure the application to use the new RDS instance

recommendations.title: Optimize EC2 Instance Type
recommendations.description: EC2 instance type can be optimized to reduce costs. Downsize the instance type to save costs.
steps: Identify the EC2 instances with high costs
Downsize the instance type to a smaller size
Reconfigure the application to use the new instance type

recommendations.title: Use Open Source Alternative for Database
recommendations.description: Use an open source database like PostgreSQL instead of RDS to save costs.
steps: Stop the RDS instance
Delete the RDS instance
Install PostgreSQL on the EC2 instance
Reconfigure the application to use PostgreSQL

recommendations.title: Use Cost-Effective Storage for S3
recommendations.description: Use cost-effective storage options like Glacier or S3 One Zone-IA to reduce costs.
steps: Identify the S3 buckets with high costs
Migrate the buckets to Glacier or S3 One Zone-IA
Reconfigure the application to use the new storage options

recommendations.title: Use Multi-Cloud for Load Balancer
recommendations.description: Use a multi-cloud load balancer like HAProxy or NGINX to reduce costs.
steps: Identify the load balancer with high costs
Install HAProxy or NGINX on the EC2 instance
Reconfigure the application to use the new load balancer

recommendations.title: Right Size CloudFront Distribution
recommendations.description: CloudFront distribution can be right-sized to reduce costs. Downsize the distribution to a smaller size.
steps: Identify the CloudFront distributions with high costs
Downsize the distribution to a smaller size
Reconfigure the application to use the new distribution

recommendations.title: Use Free Tier for CloudWatch
recommendations.description: CloudWatch has a free tier for development and testing. Migrate the monitoring and logging to the free tier to save costs.
steps: Stop the CloudWatch logs
Delete the CloudWatch logs
Create a new CloudWatch logs with the free tier
Reconfigure the application to use the new CloudWatch logs

recommendations.title: Migrate to Azure for Load Balancer
recommendations.description: Migrate the load balancer to Azure to reduce costs.
steps: Identify the load balancer with high costs
Create a new load balancer on Azure
Reconfigure the application to use the new load balancer
